problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,过点C的直线CE⊥AB,垂足为E,若∠EAD=53°,则∠BCE的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, the straight line CE ⊥ AB passing through the point C, the foot of perpendicular is E, if ∠EAD = N_0, then the degree of ∠BCE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,∴∠B=∠EAD=53°,∵CE⊥AB,∴∠BCE=90°-∠B=37°；故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质、角的互余关系；熟练掌握平行四边形的性质,求出∠B的度数是解决问题的关键．
